Introduction

WHO WE ARE

Abeywardena Sons Spice (Pvt) Ltd. is a leading exporter of premium True Ceylon Cinnamon, high-quality spices, and essential oils from Sri Lanka. With a well-established network of processing facilities and raw material collection centers, we ensure the finest quality products reach our global clients.
